name: Purifyer
description:
Purifyer is a dark atmospheric platformer game. It includes conspiracies.

Purifyer is a simple game includes just 4 levels.

Last 2 levels are pretty challenging. First 2 ones are just  hard.

The movement,controls:

Movement = 

Left Movement = A

Right Movement = D

Jump, Double Jump = W

Spell cast = Left Mouse Click
